title: 4 missing men, Dance Mom star to prison, Missy Bevers update
itunes:title: 4 missing men, Dance Mom star to prison, Missy Bevers update
description:
The disappearance of 4 young men in Pennsylvania is an unsolved mystery. Reporter Jamie Stover updates Nancy Grace on the massive search. Abbey Lee Miller starts her prison term and ET reporter Denny Directo shares what the Dance Moms star just told him. Alan Duke discusses what Missy Bevers' husband is telling him about his wife's murder probe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
